title: I mi siamte zawng zawng sualin an thim e
lyrics:
I mi siamte zawng zawng sualin an thim e,
Entir rawh, entir rawh;
Chhandamna ngai si tam tak an tlan bo ve,
Ko kir la, chhandam rawh.

Aw Lalpa, kan laina, Chhandamtu,
Ram tin ata rawn ko la;
I hmaah lo kun fo tawh sela,
Kumkhuaa Nangmah fakin.

I tirhkohten an tan an ngensak fo thin,
Ngaithla la, malsawm rawh;
An sual tawpa hremhmuna an awm loh nan,
Aw Lalpa, ngaidam rawh.

India ramah Lal Isua thlen in a vang,
Thisen chu entir rawh;
Phaitualah leh thinglangah laina Isua
Thil tuar chu lantir rawh.
